title: Nunu(willump) should be able to consume Shrooms!

replies.body: only if the screen goes blury and willump stumbles around
Yes if nunu becomes permanently poisoned, taking the dot damage and slow until he dies.
League players would be better if they consumed shrooms if you ask me but whatever
Now that's what we call E D G Y.
